h1. Profile

{{html:
  <div ng-controller="UsersController">
    <form name="form" ng-submit="updatePassword()">
      <div class="tab-pane row" style="margin-bottom: 40px; margin-left: 15px;">
        <div class="nameField" style="margin-bottom: 10px; width: 100%;">
           <label class="left control-group" style="margin: 0 10px 0 0; width: 150px; height: 30px; line-height: 30px; font-size: 14px;">Current password:</label>
          <input required ng-model="oldPassword" type="password" class="input-xxlarge" style="width: 20%; float: left; margin-right: 10px;">
        </div>
        <div class="nameField" style="margin-bottom: 10px; width: 100%;">
           <label class="left control-group" style="margin: 0 10px 0 0; width: 150px; height: 30px; line-height: 30px; font-size: 14px;">New password:</label>
          <input required ng-model="newPassword" type="password" class="input-xxlarge" style="width: 20%; float: left; margin-right: 10px;">
        </div>
        <div class="nameField" style="margin-bottom: 10px; width: 100%;">
           <label class="left control-group" style="margin: 0 10px 0 0; width: 150px; height: 30px; line-height: 30px; font-size: 14px;">Retype password:</label>
          <input required ng-model="retypePassword" type="password" class="input-xxlarge" style="width: 20%; float: left;">
        </div>
      </div>
        <button type="submit" class="btn btn-info btn-large">Update Password</button>
        <div class="txt-center">
          <div class="alert txt-center" ng-class="{'alert-success': alertStatus=='success', 'alert-danger': alertStatus=='error'}" ng-show="updateResultMessage" style="margin-top: 20px !important; width: 40%;">{[ updateResultMessage ]}</div>
        </div>
      </form>
  </div>

    <script src="/$$space/.files/js/services/UserServices.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
    <script src="/$$space/.files/js/controllers/UserController.js" type="text/javascript"></script>

}}
